concept.title: eCommerce Overview
concept.shortdesc: eCommerce is the practice of conducting business via the internet.

section.title: Overview of eCommerce
section.p: eCommerce is the practice of buying and selling goods through the use of the Internet. With Square, it's entirely possible to manage your internet based business using this online payment platform. All Square account holders have access to a free online store as well as 3 other premium plans that are paid for annually.
